name: Wormhole Skirmish
description:
Spacewar and Asteroid inspired shooter

Updated 2/7/22: I adjusted the turning and acceleration so the controls are tighter and feel more stable drifting. The idea was for movement to be more like asteroid in it's handling but the first draft made the turn speed go off the rails so I pitched it down and made it so it was easier to course correct with just the thruster force alone. Also I re-centered everything and fixed the music so it continues even after the game resets. Also I made it so the last part of the instructions wasn't hidden. The way the text box was shaped and the text was written cause the player 2 shoot prompt to be cut off. Have fun!
